price: Cyangwa bibwira ko baremye ibirere n’isi? Ahubwo ntibizera!
arabic: أَمۡ خَلَقُواْ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَۚ بَل لَّا يُوقِنُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: am khalaqū al-samāwāti wal-arḍa bal lā yūqinūna
